title: "I Am Not A Baby Making Machine," Vidya Balan Slams Pregnancy Rumours
text:
facebook 747 SHARES 
Recently, Vidya Balan was spotted visiting her family doctor. Of course, there can be only one reason why she would seek a doctor's advice - she must be pregnant! That's what many people clearly believe, as Balan told Mid-Day . "Why is it that every time a woman, post marriage, visits a doctor, there are whispers of her pregnancy?" 
Someone had to say it, and we're glad that she did, and we're doubly pleased that she added, "What is this baby obsession? I am not a baby-making machine. Anyway, the world population is on a rise. If some people don't have children, it's fine." 
That's a sentiment many of us would relate to. Motherhood is a personal choice, and should be treated as such. Unless someone announces that they are pregnant, it is ridiculous to make assumptions. Picture Credits: Getty Images /Thinkstock
